attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The city is dying around us.  A once vibrant and busy Economic Northern city is now in the top ten of every UK chart of things that are bad about the Country.  We have had a 'Hole in the City Centre' so called shopping centre for 5 years and now the council are spending £24m on a 'Park in the Heart' surrounded by the Derelict Odeon Cinema and empty or boarded up shops.  We used to be proud to live here and now the Council have systematically run our city into the ground and they don't seem to be answerable to anyone!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
